page.title: 15CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content: has counted up to forty-four he has to go and look for the other people. If he sees one of them he runs to the post and says Â£Forty-forty I see ------ running towards me and if the other person is away from the post the other people can try and run to the post and say Â£Forty-forty I save all.' Then the person who has been seen is saved. Otherwise he is Â£up' which means he stands by the post and shuts his eyes and counts to forty-four and the game starts all over again. This is a very popular game with all the boys.
